Package jav41.genericsorting

Class GenericSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • jav41.genericsorting.GenericSort
  • public class GenericSort
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic class that implements 3 different sorting algorithms: Bubblesort, Selectionsort, Quicksort as static methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GenericSort()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      T[]      		 bubbleSort​(T[] input)
      Takes a generic item set as input and performs bubblesort on the item set in ascending order.
      static java.lang.Double[] create_double_array​(int length, int max, int min)
      Simple function to create an array with random values of a certain length.
      static java.lang.Float[] create_float_array​(int length, int max, int min)
      Simple function to create an array with random values of a certain length.
      static java.lang.Integer[] create_integer_array​(int length, int max, int min)
      Simple function to create an array with random values of a certain length.
      static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      T[]      		 quicksort​(T[] input, int low, int high)
      Takes an item set of a generic type and recursively performs quicksort on it
      static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      T[]      		 selectionSort​(T[] input)
      Takes a generic item set as input and performs selectionsort on the item set in ascending order.

        public static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>> T[] bubbleSort​(T[] input)
        Takes a generic item set as input and performs bubblesort on the item set in ascending order.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the original item set
        Parameters:
        input - Original item set
        Returns:
        sorted item set

      • quicksort

        public static <T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>> T[] quicksort​(T[] input,
                                                                int low,
                                                                int high)
        Takes an item set of a generic type and recursively performs quicksort on it
        Type Parameters:
        T - Generic Type of the original item set
        Parameters:
        input - Original item set
        low - Index to start from the left
        high - Index to start from the right
        Returns:
        sorted item set

      • create_integer_array

        public static java.lang.Integer[] create_integer_array​(int length,
                                                       int max,
                                                       int min)
        Simple function to create an array with random values of a certain length.
        Parameters:
        length - length of the array to be created
        max - max value of each random vlaue
        min - min value of each random value
        Returns:
        Integer[] with random values taking length, max and min into consideration
